short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Boost your innovative sourcing with Innosabi Startup: the extension that turns a simple click into a collaboration opportunity!
short.de: Steigern Sie Ihr Sourcing mit Innosabi Startup:die Erweiterung, die einen einfachen Klick in eine Kooperationsmöglichkeit verwandelt
short.es: Impulse su sourcing con Innosabi Startup: ¡la extensión que convierte un simple clic en una oportunidad de colaboración!
short.fr: Boostez votre sourcing innovant avec Innosabi Startup : l'extension qui transforme un simple clic en opportunité de collaboration !
short.ja: Innosabi Startupで革新的なソーシングを促進：クリックするだけでコラボレーションのチャンスに変えるエクステンション！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At a time when innovation is central to the competitiveness of large companies, relationships with start-ups are becoming crucial. But managing these partnerships effectively can be complex.

That's where Innosabi Startup comes in: designed as a genuine CRM specialising in innovation, it's a powerful tool for steering your relationships with startups and managing your innovative projects.

This Chrome extension complements Innosabi Startup and simplifies your partner sourcing.

Easy to use

No need to juggle several tools: a simple click from a company's website and you can create its file in Innosabi Startup in a matter of seconds. No need for lengthy and complex training courses, you're up and running straight away.

Automatic completion of information

One of the strengths of Innosabi Startup is its ability to automatically complete information on startups. How do we do this? Thanks to our integration with Crunchbase.

When you create a new record from this extension, we automatically enrich it with the relevant data from Crunchbase. This includes the company ID Card, key contacts, financial information, maturity level, and much more.

No more tedious manual data entry. Innosabi Startup does all the work for you, leaving you more time to focus on what matters most: innovation.

In conclusion

Innosabi Startup is much more than just a CRM tool. It's a strategic partner for your innovation department, helping you to navigate the complex startup ecosystem with ease and efficiency. Join us today and unlock the full potential of your collaborations with startups.
